sense.name: gladly accept or approve
sense.examples: She welcomed serious discussion of literature and science. I welcome your proposals. Pets are welcomed at the Chippewa Moraine State Recreation Area.

sense.name: to greet upon arrival, to receive someone
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[human] WELCOME NP2[human] NP1[animate] WELCOME NP2[human] NP1[human] WELCOME NP2[animate] NP1[animate] WELCOME NP2[animate]
sense.examples: He welcomed the new students into the department. Welcome to my world! A Navy petty officer is enthusiastically welcomed by his dog after returning home.
